biotools.summary: This server predicts the alpha turn residues in the given protein sequence. The method is based on the neural network training on PSI-BLAST generated position specific matrices and PSIPRED predicted secondary structure.

bioschemas.name: AlphaPred
bioschemas.summary: This server predicts the alpha turn residues in the given protein sequence. The method is based on the neural network training on PSI-BLAST generated position specific matrices and PSIPRED predicted secondary structure.
